price: Ndërsa ky (Kuran) është Këshillë e bekuar, të cilën Ne e kemi shpallur, prandaj, si mund ta mohoni ju atë?!
arabic: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wahādhā dhik'run mubārakun anzalnāhu afa-antum lahu munkirūna
